TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void StructureChangedEventHandler(object sender, StructureChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed StructureChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub StructureChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As StructureChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void StructureChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, StructureChangedEventArgs ^ e);
type StructureChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * StructureChangedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: El objeto que ha generado el evento.

span.span: The object that raised the event.

summary.span: Representa el método implementado por la aplicación cliente para controlar el evento provocado cuando ha cambiado la estructura del árbol de automatización de la interfaz de usuario.

span.span: Represents the method implemented by the client application to handle the event raised when the UI Automation tree structure has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks En la tabla siguiente describe la información del evento recibido por el delegado para cambios en la estructura diferentes.The following table describes the information in the event received by the delegate for different structure changes. |`e.structureChangeType`|`sender`|`e.runtimeId`| |-----------------------------|--------------|-------------------| ||Elemento secundario que se ha agregado.The child that was added.|Elemento secundario que se ha agregado.The child that was added.| ||El elemento primario del elemento secundario que se ha quitado.The parent of the child that was removed.|Elemento secundario que se ha eliminado.The child that was removed.| ||El elemento primario de los elementos secundarios que se han agregado.The parent of the children that were added.|El elemento primario de los elementos secundarios que se han agregado.The parent of the children that were added.| ||El elemento primario de los elementos secundarios que se quitaron.The parent of the children that were removed.|El elemento primario de los elementos secundarios que se quitaron.The parent of the children that were removed.| ||El elemento primario de los elementos secundarios que se invalidaron.The parent of the children that were invalidated.|El elemento primario de los elementos secundarios que se invalidaronThe parent of the children that were invalidated|
